TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DefaultValueAttribute extends System.Attribute

span.span: Specifies the default value for a property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以创建包含的任何值。You can create a with any value. 成员的默认值通常为其初始值。A member's default value is typically its initial value. 可视化设计器可以使用默认值来重置该成员的值。A visual designer can use the default value to reset the member's value. 代码生成器可以使用默认值也以确定是否应为成员生成代码。Code generators can use the default values also to determine whether code should be generated for the member. > [!NOTE] > 一个不会导致成员，才能使用该属性的值自动初始化。A will not cause a member to be automatically initialized with the attribute's value. 必须在代码中设置的初始值。You must set the initial value in your code. 有关更多信息，请参阅[特性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例设置的默认值`MyProperty`到`false`。The following example sets the default value of `MyProperty` to `false`. [!code-cpp[Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下一步的示例检查的默认值`MyProperty`。The next example checks the default value of `MyProperty`. 首先，代码获取与对象的所有属性。First the code gets a with all the properties for the object. 接下来索引访问若要获取`MyProperty`。Next it indexes into the to get `MyProperty`. 然后返回此属性的属性，并将其保存到特性变量中。Then it returns the attributes for this property and saves them in the attributes variable. 该示例然后打印默认值通过检索从，并将其名称写入控制台屏幕。The example then prints the default value by retrieving the from the , and writing its name to the console screen. [!code-cpp[Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#2)]
